name: spread
constraint: (declare-const CO_SPEC Int)(declare-const CI0_SPEC Int)(assert (>= CO_SPEC CI0_SPEC))
(declare-const RO_SPEC Int)(declare-const RI0_SPEC Int)(assert (<= RO_SPEC RI0_SPEC))
(declare-const IG0_SPEC Int)(declare-const OG_SPEC Int)(assert (= IG0_SPEC OG_SPEC))
(declare-const IC0_SPEC Int)(declare-const OH_SPEC Int)(assert (>= IC0_SPEC OH_SPEC))
(declare-const IC0_SPEC Int)(declare-const OC_SPEC Int)(assert (>= IC0_SPEC OC_SPEC))
